ISSUE.TITLE: Update Delete button variant to secondary
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY As per feedback from @trahman73, the delete button should be updated to variant `secondary`. Only place where delete button variant should be `danger` is the modal where the action is performed. General example: Modal example:

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update delete button variant to secondary Update delete button variant to secondary, except in Modals. see: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/7722
